title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
OB: When switching perspectives in the IDE, the CVS repository view loses its maximized state.
EB: The CVS repository view should retain its maximized state when switching perspectives.
SR: 1. Open the CVS repository view in the Java perspective. 2. Double click the title bar to maximize it. 3. Switch to the resource perspective. 4. Return to the Java perspective.
